snippet.title: Ninja Five-O | Reveal Trailer | Limited Run Games
snippet.description:
#limitedrungames #carbonengine #konami 

One of the most sought-after titles for the Game Boy Advance, Ninja Five-O (also known as Ninja Cop) is an action platformer game that tasks hero Joe Ostugi with eliminating a terrorist group corrupted by a set of mystical masks. 

Over 20 years after its initial release, the Carbon Engine team at Limited Run is bringing this title back to the Nintendo Switch and PlayStation platforms. This re-release features the true-to-release controls and playability that the Carbon Engine is known for, along with rewind features to put players in control of the game. 

Physical pre-orders and digital launch coming in 2024. Stay in the loop by following Limited Run Games on your social platform of choice!
